typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Email as string,
		Gender as string,
		Country as string,
		Address as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> CustomerStage
source(output(
		SKCustID as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Email as string,
		Gender as string,
		Country as string,
		Address as string,
		IsActive as integer,
		InsertDate as timestamp,
		ValidFromDate as date,
		ValidToDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> CustomerView
CustomerStage derive(SrcHash = md5(CustomerID,FirstName,LastName)) ~> HashSource
CustomerView derive(DimHash = md5(CustomerID,FirstName,LastName)) ~> HashDimension
HashSource, HashDimension exists(SrcHash == DimHash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistsHashInsert
ExistsHashInsert derive(Gender = case(case( Gender=='Male',1,Gender=='Female',2)==1,'Male',
     case( Gender=='Male',1,Gender=='Female',2)==2,'Female'),
		IsActive = 1,
		InsertDate = currentUTC('dd-MM-yyyy hh:mm'),
		ValidFromDate = currentUTC('dd-MM-yyyy'),
		ValidToDate = toDate('99993112','yyyyddMM')) ~> Insertattributes
HashDimension, HashSource exists(CustomerView@CustomerID == CustomerStage@CustomerID
	&& CustomerView@FirstName != CustomerStage@FirstName
	&& CustomerView@LastName != CustomerStage@LastName
	&& CustomerView@Email == CustomerStage@Email,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistsHashUpdate
ExistsHashUpdate derive(IsActive = 0,
		InsertDate = currentUTC('dd-MM-yyyy hh:mm'),
		ValidToDate = currentUTC('dd-MM-yyyy')) ~> Updateattributes
Updateattributes alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterDim
Insertattributes sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SKCustID as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Email as string,
		Gender as string,
		Country as string,
		Address as string,
		IsActive as integer,
		InsertDate as timestamp,
		ValidFromDate as date,
		ValidToDate as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		Email,
		Gender,
		Country,
		Address,
		IsActive,
		InsertDate,
		ValidFromDate,
		ValidToDate
	)) ~> CustomerDimInsert
AlterDim sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SKCustID as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Email as string,
		Gender as string,
		Country as string,
		Address as string,
		IsActive as integer,
		InsertDate as timestamp,
		ValidFromDate as date,
		ValidToDate as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['SKCustID','CustomerID'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SKCustID,
		CustomerID,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		Email,
		Gender,
		Country,
		Address,
		IsActive,
		InsertDate,
		ValidFromDate,
		ValidToDate
	)) ~> CustomerDimUpdate
